title: Chat restriction

replies.body:
If you want to contest a punishment, we'd be happy to consider it. No system is perfect, after all, and we want to be informed of any bans that appear to be completely inaccurate. But you should post your chat logs so this can properly be assessed. The logs are given to you by the instant feedback system every time you log in during the duration of your punishment. They are also emailed to you.

Here is the log that triggered your ban. You said quite a bit more than 3 things, and a chat restriction was reasonable in this case. I've censored a couple of words:
